function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Unidentified symbols and characters could indicate potential security risks or data corruption.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unidentified text content","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Poor ventilation and air circulation in the built environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of surface hygiene and cleaning protocols","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate social distancing and overcrowding","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complex and ambiguous text with potential security risk in encoded parts.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Text mentions the spread of contagious diseases in built environments at all scales.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Contagious transmission of coronavirus from animal to human","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Environmentally mediated transmission of covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High occupant density facilitates the accrual of human-associated microorganisms","category":"Structure","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Increased exposure risk associated with high occupant density and consistent contact demonstrated in covid-19 outbreaks","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High transmissibility of covid-19 in confined spaces within the built environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Resuspension of viral particles due to natural and mechanical airflow patterns in the built environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transfer of viruses from individuals to surfaces and vice versa through contact","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contamination of fomites with sars-cov-2 particles from infected individuals and bodily secretions","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Survival of sars-cov-2 on different surfaces, indicating potential for fomite transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of sars-cov-2 through fecal-oral pathway","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Possibility of sars-cov-2 transmission through aerosols","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 and other contagious diseases through droplets and aerosolization in the built environment","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate filtration techniques for removing pathogens like sars-cov-2 from shared air environments.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of the sharing economy on infectious disease transmission in shared spaces such as coworking environments, homes, and transportation.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of proper handwashing and hygiene practices","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close contact and spatial proximity with infected persons","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate use and handling of masks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of implementation of social distancing measures in local communities","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate understanding and implementation of environmental precautions","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The spread of sars-cov-2 through aerosolized water droplets from sink areas","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective handwashing and hand sanitizing protocols","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for spread of sars-cov-2 in buildings due to viral particles associated with larger particles that can potentially penetrate high efficiency filters.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increasing outside air fractions may lead to increased energy consumption","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Not all air-handling systems have capacity to substantially increase outside air ratios","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High airflow rates without increased outside air fraction can increase transmission potential of contagious diseases","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Higher rh decreases airborne dispersal of viral particles","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Higher humidity negatively impacts lipid-enveloped viruses through interactions with the polar membrane heads","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Changes in humidity impact susceptibility to infection and viral particle deposition in the respiratory tract","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of overhumidification increasing the potential of mold growth","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased rh may lead to increased buildup on filters, decreasing airflow","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Effectiveness of capturing viral particles is increased with increased rh, but may lead to overhumidification","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased window ventilation may expose occupants to extreme temperature profiles.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Close proximity in buildings may promote potential viral transfer from one residence to another.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient understanding of the impact of natural light on sars-cov-2 indoors.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure to uvc light can pose safety concerns for room occupants if not properly installed or used.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unexplored effects of daylight on indoor viruses and sars-cov-2 could lead to a lack of effective mitigation strategies.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate implementation of spectrally tuned electric lighting for disinfection indoors could lead to ineffective virus inactivation.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uvc and uvgi light disinfectant strategies for buildings may have unintended consequences if not implemented with appropriate precaution.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spatial configurations designed to encourage social interactions may inadvertently enhance opportunities for transmission of viruses.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited options for social-distancing measures in health care facilities","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Cohousing patients with vastly different requirements","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Positively pressurized protective environment pe rooms","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"}]}
